author: Sara Germano
title: USA Track & Field President Placed on Leave Amid Corruption Probe - WSJ
text:
The president of USA Track & Field was placed on leave by the organization after being approached by federal investigators as part of a wide-ranging probe into alleged sports corruption.
The president, Vin Lananna, was initially approached by investigators “months ago” as part of its ongoing probe into the awarding of several sports events, including the 2021 World Championships to the city of Eugene, Ore., according to USATF.
